title: Design for Printed Textile-Giant Rectangles, Series #480
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Blueprint and green stamped ink on off-white wove paper
description: Pattern resembling a brick wall, or stacked rectangles in four off-set rows. The lines are printed in white with the background a uniform blue.
name: Diazo print
